title: Karthus ult vs Xayah ult
body: Noticed this playing urf, but when Xayah ults and becomes "untargetable," she gets hit by a Karthus ult while still in the air in untargetable state. Master Yi's Alpha Strike, Fizz's Trickster, and Spider form Elise Rappel can dodge it as far as I know. Elise for sure since I was playing her vs Karth before. Is Xayah intended to still get hit while in her ult?

replies.body: Yes. She is untargetable. That does not mean Invulnerable. If something is applied before she ults, like the animation of Karthus' ult or a DOT like Ignite, she will still be damaged by it.

> [{quoted}](name=Ethan Allen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=JsHVRo6J,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-24T03:01:56.933+0000)
>
> Yes. She is untargetable. That does not mean Invulnerable. If something is applied before she ults, like the animation of Karthus' ult or a DOT like Ignite, she will still be damaged by it.

No, karthus' ult is dodgeable by fizz and master yi and elise

If it wasn't for champions like Yi and Fizz I would agree with you, but champions that have untargetable states are able to avoid Karthus' ult damage.
Even Shaco can avoid Karthus' ult with correct timing with his own.

She should be able to avoid it. 
Either he's hitting you the frame before/after you exit untargetable or it's a straight up bug. 
It's worth looking into to be sure though.
